environment variables.description: Sensitive information that we need to hide under environment variables, you will need to setup them manually in your system, if at least one missing error wil occurred.

GO_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access key id, you can get this from your aws account
GO_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.type: AWS access key ID, represented as string

GO_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret key,  you can get this from your aws account
GO_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.type: AWS secret key, represented as string

GO_AWS_DYNAMO_ENDPOINT.description: Endpoint of your dynamo db, can be found in information panel of your DynamoDB instance

GO_AWS_DYNAMO_REGION.description: Region of your DynamoDB instance, NOTE THIS IS NOT REGION NAME

GO_MYSQL_DSN.description: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_source_name , basically this is string to connect to MYSQL

config.json.description: In config.json we have not sensitive configuration information

ip.type: ip or domain name, as string
ip.description: ip address that will be used to run our server

port.description: port that will be used to run our server

staticDir.description: Absolute path to directory with static files.
